chunks.text:
@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com> , Everyone, good morning,

 

Please note, as per our final direction, we shall not comply with the mall for an opening on 25th of September and thus we keep the initial planning as following:

 

*	we’ll close Al Ain as per the initial plan, on 24th of September after trading hours – we’ll surrender the unit in as is condition, on October 4th . To follow with the clearance certificates whenever ready. Same is being communicated with AL Ain mall management.
*	JIMI mall construction will be finalized by the 18th of September. 
*	We need to make sure we have the CCTV connectivity asap so that it is ready whenever we deliver the merch to the store. Plan B in case the CCTV is not ready to book security.
*	Tawtheeq will be ready by early next week as advised by Chalhoub concerned team. @liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  once received, for your urgent action to submit for TAQA inspection and permanent power. @Connie Madeira <mailto:connie.madeira@chalhoub.com>  as well, upon Tawtheeq receipt please for urgent action to connect the AC with ISTA.

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  Let’s discuss all the remaining tasks during our upcoming weekly meeting. In the meanwhile, if you have any question please do not hesitate.

 

Please share with relevant stakeholders in case they’re missed to be added in the loop

 

Thank you so much.

 

Jad Chaoul

Regional Architect

 

MAKE UP FOR EVER | LVMH Group

Dubai Design District, Building 11, 4th Floor,

PO Box 17200

Dubai, United Arab Emirates

+971 58 578 4877

Best regards,
